@mr-linter/changed_files_limit.description: Check count changed files on a {limit}.

@mr-linter/description_contains_links_of.description: Merge Request must contain links of any {domains}.
Merge Request must contain links of all {domains}.

@mr-linter/has_any_labels.description: Merge Request must have any labels.

@mr-linter/jira/has_issue_link.description: The description must have a link to Jira on a {domain} with {projectCode}.

@mr-linter/youtrack/has_issue_link.description: The description must have a link to YouTrack issue on a {domain} with {projectCode}.

@mr-linter/title_must_starts_with_any_pr.description: The title must starts with any {prefixes}

@mr-linter/has_changes.description: Merge Request must have changes in {files}.

starts.description: Check if a string contains a prefix.

notStarts.description: Check if a string not contains a prefix.

ends.description: Check if a string contains a suffix.

notEnds.description: Check if a string not contains a suffix.

contains.description: Check if a string contains a substring.

notEquals.description: Check if value are not equal.

!=.description: Check if value are not equal.

equalsAny.description: Check if the field is equal to one of the values.

match.description: Check if a string match a regex.

isEmpty.description: Check if a value is empty.

isCamelCase.description: Check if a string is camel case.

isStudlyCase.description: Check if a string is studly case.

isUpperCase.description: Check if a string is upper case.

isLowerCase.description: Check if a string is lower case.

isSnakeCase.description: Check if a string is snake_case.

isKebabCase.description: Check if a string is kebab-case.

countMin.description: Check the minimum number of elements in a field.

countMax.description: Check the maximum number of elements in a field.

has.description: Check if an array contains some value.

notHas.description: Check if an array not contains some value.

hasAny.description: Check if an array contains some value of list.

isEmpty.description: Check if a value is empty.

$all.description: True if all values of array matched conditions.
